column1: Subsequently A finds the original certificate and, either because he has forgotten about the sale to B or because he is a rogue, then purports to sell the shares to C. The company will rightly refuse to register C whose only remedy will be against A ( who may by this time be a man - of - straw ) unless he can successfully invoke against the company the so - called doctrine of estoppel by share certificate.

column1: For instance, he said that the expression ‘ by hook or by crook’ came from the period of Charles II when there were two judges called Hook and Crook and ‘ a man of straw’he discovered, was one who could be brought to bear false witness — recognisable by the straw in his shoes.
